subject: Re: Problems with assertEquals()
msgSnippet: Hi Jason, ... It throws a junit.framework.AssertionFailedError . But now it works - the hint from Robert was fine. Thank you, too! :-) Daniel
messageBody:
Hi Jason,

> > [...]
> > But if I wanna test directly with "assertEquals()" it breaks:
> >
> > ----- snip -----
> > assertEquals("My Test", object1, object2);
> > ----- snap -----
> >
> >
> > The last line in the first code snippet is exactly the test
> > "assertEquals()" performs - but it returns an exception.
>
> What exception is it throwing?

It throws a "junit.framework.AssertionFailedError".
But now it works - the hint from Robert was fine. Thank you, too! :-)


Daniel
